item.description:
.@samlansky has such a wondrous way with words, and Iâ€™ve loved reading his pieces for over a decade. If youâ€™ve ever been around him, you know heâ€™s just the best type of person: Curious. Interested. Hilarious. Intriguing and intrigued. I have tRuSt iSSueS when it comes to interviews but I couldnâ€™t be happier that I did this one with him. I was blown away to see quotes from people I adore and admire like Stevie Nicks, Greta Gerwig, Shonda Rhimes, Phoebe Bridgers, Natalie Maines, Kenny Chesney, and Lucian Grainge. I was so happy he spoke to fans Madison and McCall who were so eloquent, loyal, and kind. Iâ€™m really reflecting on this year, and all the years that led up to it. Canâ€™t say thank you enough times. ğŸ¥²

time.com/6342806/person-of-tâ€¦

item.description:
Um ok this is unreal?? I just wanted to say to anyone who listened to my music this year, anywhere in the world, thank you. Getting named Spotifyâ€™s Global Top Artist in 2023 is truly the best birthday/holiday gift you couldâ€™ve given me. Weâ€™ve seriously had THE MOST fun this year out there on tour and now this. Are you serious. So I was trying to think of a way to thank you, and a lot of you have been asking me to put â€œYouâ€™re Losing Me (From The Vault)â€ on streaming... so here you go! You can finally listen EVERYWHERE now ğŸ’‹

taylor.lnk.to/YLMfromthevaulâ€¦

ğŸ“·:Buda Mendes / @GettyImages
item.description:
Bringing a tour to Brazil has been something Iâ€™ve dreamt of for years, and those fans blew my expectations away. Weâ€™ve officially wrapped up the 2023 Eras Tour and we got to end the year with 6 shows in Rio and SÃ£o Paulo, with the most magical crowds. Iâ€™m so grateful to my touring family, my band, crew and dancers for everything they put into this show all year. To the people who came to see it, you are what made those stadiums feel so alive and electric and unforgettable for me. Really just feeling so proud and moved by what I got to be a part of. See you in 2024 ğŸ¤ ğŸ¸ ğŸ¹ âœ¨

ğŸ“·: Buda Mendes / @GettyImages

Hi! Well, so, basically I have a birthday coming up and I was thinking a fun way to celebrate the year weâ€™ve had together would be to make The Eras Tour Concert Film available for you to watch at home! Very happy to be able to tell you that the extended version of the film including â€œWildest Dreams,â€ â€œThe Archerâ€ and â€œLong Liveâ€ will be available to rent on demand in the US, Canada & additional countries to be announced soon starting on â€¦ you guessed it, December 13 ğŸ«¶ğŸ’‹

Andddd weâ€™re back at it! Starting off the South American leg of The Eras Tour in Argentina = best decision possible. I canâ€™t even express my gratitude to the Buenos Aires crowds. Iâ€™d never been to Argentina before and they gave us the most electric, magical memories. Thanks to the amazing fans whose show was postponed Friday for coming back Sunday and blowing us away with your passion and excitement. See you next weekend, Rio!! ğŸ’‹ğŸ©µğŸ”œ

ğŸ“·: @marceloendelli / @GettyImages

I love a rain show but Iâ€™m never going to endanger my fans or my fellow performers and crew. Weâ€™ve rescheduled tonightâ€™s Buenos Aires show for Sunday due to the weather being so truly chaotic it would be unsafe to try and put on this concert. Good news is I get to stay in Argentina longer!!

item.description: There youâ€™ll stand ten feet tall, I will say â€˜I knew it all alongâ€™ ğŸ¥² This song has always made me think of my friend Jack. It was the first song we made together and watching him challenge himself and make beautiful art over the years has been the thrill of a lifetime. How can he be 6 years older than me and also somehow still be my precocious young son? We may never know. â€œSweeter Than Fiction (My Version)â€ is now available exclusively at Target on Tangerine vinyl ğŸŠğŸ©µ

item.description:
Watching @kendricklamar create and record his verses on the Bad Blood remix was one of the most inspiring experiences of my life. I still look back on this collaboration with so much pride and gratitude, for the ways Kendrick elevated the song and the way he treats everyone around him. Every time the crowds on The Eras Tour would chant his line â€˜you forgive, you forget, but you never let itâ€¦ go!â€™, I smiled. The reality that Kendrick would go back in and re-record Bad Blood so that I could reclaim and own this work Iâ€™m so proud of is surreal and bewildering to me. Iâ€™m overjoyed to say that the Bad Blood Remix (featuring Kendrick Lamar) is available everywhere on the 1989 Deluxe Edition. ğŸ«¶ğŸ©µ

taylor.lnk.to/1989TaylorsVerâ€¦

item.description:
What a truly mind blowing thing youâ€™ve turned The Eras Tour Concert Film into. Iâ€™ve been watching videos of you guys in the theaters dancing and prancing and recreating choreography, creating inside jokes, casting spells, getting engaged, and just generally creating the exact type of joyful chaos weâ€™re known for ğŸ˜‡ One of my favorite things youâ€™ve done was when you supported Cruel Summer SO much, I ended up starting The Eras Tour show with it. For old times sake, Iâ€™m releasing the live audio from the tour so we can all shriek it in the comfort of our homes and cars PLUS a brand new remix by @LPGiobbi ğŸ˜œ Thank you, so much, forever, wow, just thank you!!!

taylor.lnk.to/thecruelestsumâ€¦

item.description: ğŸ©µ PREMIERE DAY ğŸ©µ Andddd I canâ€™t really wrap my head around this butâ€¦. Look what you genuinely made me do: Due to unprecedented demand weâ€™re opening up early access showings of The Eras Tour Concert Film on THURSDAY in America and Canada!! As inâ€¦ TOMORROW. Weâ€™re also adding additional showtimes Friday and throughout the weekend. All tickets will be available by 10am tomorrow morning. And itâ€™ll be showing starting Friday in 90 countries all over the world. I canâ€™t thank you enough for wanting to see this film that so vividly captures my favorite adventure Iâ€™ve ever been a part of: The Eras Tour. And the best part is, itâ€™s an adventure weâ€™re still on together. ğŸ«¶ Getting in the car nowâ€¦

item.description: Itâ€™s a new soundtrack ğŸ©µ Here are the back covers and vault track titles for 1989 (my version) I canâ€™t wait for this one to be out, seriously. Thank you for playing along, sleuthing, puzzling and making these reveals so much chaotic fun (which is the best kind of fun, after all ğŸ˜œ)
